channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside of 118, 7th September
item.description:
Hello! Our street- the road and the pavement is very dirty with litter and rubbish. It feels like it never gets sweeped compared to the other streets adjacent. Please rectify asap and make it a permanent practice. It’s not the first time I am reporting it already. Thank you!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped Building Waste, 7th September
item.description:
Massive dumping on Footscray Fields, south of Rectory Lane (Stable Block) Car. Dumped after 20.00 last night,access from tyre tracks appears to.have been from Church gate.

item.title: Tree needs pruning, 7th September
item.description:
Tree outside 78 Kings Avenue (large green painted house) needs pruning as it grows very low and covers most of the pavement - you have to duck under it to get past.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Avenue, Plaistow, London

item.title: Household waste, 7th September
item.description:
Miscellaneous household waste and recycling incorrectly packed left in street Sunday morning two full days ahead of correct collection day. Addresses of both residents of 19 Trinity Church Square clearly visible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trinity Church Square, The Borough, London

item.title: Strong smell of urine and broken glass on the pavement of Chiltern court/wonderpass walkway, 7th September
item.description:
There is the strong smell of urine on the corner of pavement of Chiltern court/wonderpass walkway at the right hand side of accessorize. The pavement need to be cleaned and broken glass need to be removed from pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62-64, Baker Street, Marylebone, London

item.title: Numerous union flags and St George’s cross flags tied to lampposts, 7th September
item.description:
I find this extremely offensive, intimidating and an outright sign of racism. I hope that you will remove them at the earliest opportunity. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Southwood Road, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flat 11 Chester House (details of dumper on images), 7th September
item.description:
Please issues two fines (at minimum) for this person who dumped in the ams on Sunday, 7 September. Flat 11, Chester House, SE8 5OY. Reference order: ORD25080454241 Invoice: K99420751691 1 Sender Name: Darren Zhao Sender Address: Coral Mill, Blackshaw Lane, Bolton LA, BL35PT

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 210 - 218, Trafalgar Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven surface, much patching, 7th September
item.description:
Hailsham Avenue has a very patchwork pavement which has an uneven surface, much vegetation growth through the path and represents a trip hazard after the many partial attempts to fix it. Many adjoining streets have had this hazard recognised and have had re-paved surfaces but Hailsham has been repeatedly excluded from remediation works including in the last six months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hailsham Avenue, Streatham Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover banging getting louder, 7th September
item.description:
This one keeps reoccurring and I believe someone fixed the small patch around the manhole cover recently, sadly it had no affect as vehicles driving over it still gives a loud double bang on the grate. In the past the whole area was patched over which at least gave a couple of months of rest bite from the banging before it started crumbling again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 525, Old Kent Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
